reviews.text: 'Had to catch an early morning flight. 'Arrived late the night before. I felt comfortable checking in at a late hour; the young person (student) at the desk was very pleasant/welcoming. {Many restaurants (fast food, etc.) in the immediate area. Most seem to close by 10PM.} The king bed was comfortable, the room was "roomy"; the bathroom and room in general, were clean. I glimpsed the breakfast food buffet, as I retrieved my coffee in the AM. It was well organized, appetizing, clean etc. My accolades to the hard-working female setup person, at this early hour!! (I have seen many breakfast bars, and this one was really well done.) So...do stay here! P.S. It is located very close to the airport, but far enough not to be pounded by jet noise.
reviews.title: Yes...stay here!

reviews.text: good hotel, clean, very accomidating. However they were remodeling the lobel, and according the the front desk clerk, the whole hotel. They did not have any signs stating this. most places put a "please excuse our mess.....remodeling...sorry for the inconvenience" and they didnt have one, floor tore up in lobby and doing breakfast area.
reviews.title: 2nd time stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Same attractive, functional room and good breakfast as other Hampton Inns. This one has many interesting dinner options in walking distance and is convenient to the interstate. Arrived on a Saturday evening with no reservation; very friendly desk staff.
reviews.title: Another Hampton Inn meets expectations

reviews.text: We stopped on way back from Florida on I - 75 late in evening. Upon arrival staff was helpful and friendly and even though we were obviously desperate for a room offered a discount on request. The room was large with very comfortable beds. Breakfast included with the hotel was good with lots to eat for adults and kids. Even when leaving the staff member working wished us well with rest of journey. Excellent experience.
reviews.title: Great Hampton Inn!

reviews.text: Great staff , friendly and helpful. Hotel looks new and is very well kept . One of the nicer Hamptons .Tons of restuarants waking distance from hotel. In a great area if you want to walk to eat! Smokey Bones, Red Lobster, Olive Garden, Tim Hortons, Ruby Tuesday, Outback , and the list goes on...... There is also a Wal-Mart/Sam's right next door. Will stay here again for sure.
reviews.title: Great place , right off i75

reviews.text: I am what one would say is a road warrior and stay at Hampton Inns regularly. I typically wouldn't waste time to review such a property except that it was surprisingly nice, I had to comment.
reviews.title: Surprisingly nice!

reviews.text: The reception was elegant and the rooms smelled exceptionally clean and fresh. I had been on the road all day and had a 6am flight the next day so it was lovely to come to this hotel for much needed rest! If you're in the area, I recommend it.
reviews.title: All Hamptons Should Be So nice

reviews.text: Immaculate, reservation correct and room exceeded expectations. Great staff and easy to reach. After a very long drive the room was an oasis for the weary. I almost changed my route on the way home to stay there again.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I could not find much to complain about and I am fairly picky. The hotel is located in a great area close to I75 and a lot of restaurants. All of the staff were polite and friendly. Room and grounds were well maintained. Room was very clean and nicely decorated. Breakfast was great. I will stay here again on my next trip to Dayton.
reviews.title: Great Hampton
Better than Many
reviews.text: Staff make or break a place - and they really made it here! Very helpful and customer service oriented. Rooms were large - modern and clean - breakfast room was huge and breakfast was one of the better ones we have had

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I spent three nights at the hotel and the experience just couldn't be beat. The location was was near everything you could possibly need, it is a couple of minutes from the airport and the room was quite spacious with just about all the comforts of home. The breakfast was delicious and there were two ladies (hello Diane and Joyce) who made sure the area was SPOTLESS and kept everyone moving and organized. If your travels take you to Dayton please do yourself a favor......reduce your stress.....by staying at this Hampton.
reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely clean modern hotel, good sized room with fridge and microwave.
reviews.title: First class

reviews.text: On arriving we were greeted by the very friendly reception staff (Amanda?) who went out of her way to organise a taxi for our four day stay.
reviews.title: Nice, Clean, Close to food....sloooow Wi-Fi

reviews.text: The complementary breakfast is fantastic. Help yourself to things on the hot plate, eggs, bacon,sausage, hash browns etc, bagels, toast, waffles, cereals, fruit, yogurt etc. and if you didn't have time for breakfast there was a bag to go with cereal bars, fruit, water etc.
reviews.title: Great staff but only chain restaurants in area convenient to airport

reviews.text: There are many chain restaurants in walking distance and a Walmart across the car park opposite.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn - Uber nice.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived here to a pleasant staff and had a perfectly clean quite room. We had a corner king bed suite with a mini fridge. Our room had a couch that wasn't overly comfortable to sit in but functional. The be on the other hand was dreamy :)
reviews.title: Great stay at the ever reliable Hampton

reviews.text: I stayed at this property for two nights. The hotel has the usual Hampton Inn reliability and then some. There is, of course, the free hot breakfast, which is ample and well stocked and the baked cookies upon check-in. The breakfast and common area are larger than a lot of Hampton Inns that I've stayed at. There is a well maintained fitness room with two treadmills, an elliptical and a bike, as well as free weights and a universal machine. There is also an indoor pool area. Each staff member that I encountered was very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: One of the nicest Hampton Inns that I've stayed at!

reviews.text: The rooms are very well kept and clean. The work area is great and the bathrooms are decent in size with granite countertops.
reviews.title: Excellent property

reviews.text: The location of the property is very convenient. It's located right off of the interstate (literally) and there are countless restaurants within a mile or two of the hotel (for example, just to name a few...Smokey Bones, Red Lobster, Olive Garden, Tim Hortons, Ruby Tuesday, Panera Bread...I could go on and on). There is also a Wal-Mart/Sam's right next door. The airport (DAY) is about 10 minutes away.
reviews.title: Good for business stay, not as nice as other Hamptons

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bottom line is that this is a fantastic place to stay for business travel. I would definitely come back to this property if I had to visit the area again in the future.
reviews.title: All I expected
